content: Planning Area in West, Singapore **Pioneer** is a [planning area](/wiki/Urban_planning_areas_in_Singapore) located in the [West Region](/wiki/West_Region,_Singapore) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), named after Pioneer Road. The area is bounded by [Jurong West](/wiki/Jurong_West) to the north, [Boon Lay](/wiki/Boon_Lay) to the east, [Tuas](/wiki/Tuas) to the west, the [Western Water Catchment](/wiki/Western_Water_Catchment) to the northwest and Selat Jurong to the south. It contains several major industrial estates including [Joo Koon](/wiki/Joo_Koon), [Benoi](/wiki/Benoi) and [Gul Circle](/wiki/Gul_Circle), which form part of the larger Jurong Industrial Estate. Pioneer today comprises five subzones: Benoi Sector, Gul Basin, Gul Circle, Joo Koon and the Pioneer Sector itself. ## Etymology The area was formerly known as *Jalan Besi*. During the development of Jurong Industrial Estate, [JTC Corporation](/wiki/JTC_Corporation) renamed the [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language)-named roads in the area into English, particularly those near [Jalan Buroh](/wiki/Jalan_Buroh). Pioneer Road was previously *Jalan Besi* (Malay: [Metal](/wiki/Metal) Road), Pioneer Road North was *Jalan Bandaran* (Malay: [Town](/wiki/Town) Road) and Pioneer Circus was *Bulatan Besi* (Malay: Metal Circus or Metal Circle). This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pioneer, Singapore
